name: Gailardia J
description:
Gailardia is a standard RPG game.

If you like royal road RPG, I think I can enjoy it considerably.

Because it is not too complicated, not only beginners can enjoy it but also elements such as tool complete elements are included, so even advanced users are recommended!

Free download, no in-app billing, no advertising and you can play until the end!

In addition, Gailardia has also released many sequel and related game information on the site!
